name: Unacted Fate (Prototype)
description:
♦ DESCRIPTION ♦

Unacted Fate is a card-based Fast FPS. Use your cards to build synergies and get through a haunting theater play. All while dodging, sliding and jumping around the stage. Build your deck, upgrade your cards and try to make it till the end of the show.

♦ CARDS ♦  BURST FIRE ➼ Sends a seeking firebolt that deals a random amount of damage. (Sends more firebolts at higher ranks)

 SUDDEN DEATH ➼ An explosive that can be detonated by another card. Causing it to deal more damage.

FALLING STAR ➼ A projectile that deals damage based on the distance it traveled before landing.

ELECTRIFY ➼ An electric arc that deals damage to a target and another nearby enemy.

AERYA ➼ A burst of wind that knocks both the player and the enemies.

 HOLLOW EFFIGY ➼ An effigy that replicates the last card effect you've used.

Credits: Bertrand Razafimanana ● Luigi De Angelis ● Nathan Lebocq Valentin Razac ● Thibault Hourcade Dit Belloc Morgan Pilat ● Jonas Martin
